title: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: Excessive flashing occurs in the Control Example.
OB: When resizing the window vertically in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and Frames flash excessively.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should resize smoothly without excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs within the TabFolder and Frames.
